name: Homefront: The Revolution - The Voice Of Freedom
summary:
The Voice of Freedom is the first downloadable content and Prequel of Homefront: The Revolution.
You are Benjamin Walker, hero of the Resistance and the most wanted man in America. Now you are risking everything to infiltrate Philadelphia and ignite a revolution that will sweep the KPA out of America on a tide of bloody vengeance.
If you fail all hope for freedom is surely lost...

- Play as Benjamin Walker and take part in a dangerous mission to enter Philadelphia under cover of darkness - Meet up with Jack Parrish’s Resistance Cell before the events of Homefront: The Revolution. - Encounter a new, dangerous faction in the subways of Philadelphia – the notorious street gang, the “90”.
